sentences.en: A normal proxy can tunnel encrypted data, but it cannot cache it.
sentences.cn: 正常可以.加密数据, 但不能缓存它.

sentences.en: But my Dad used to be the sheriff and that had a certain cache.
sentences.cn: 但是我爸爸曾经是这里的治安官,那也算有点权力.

sentences.en: Files are placed in the cache until the cache is full.
sentences.cn: 直至高速缓存被充满之前,文件始终驻留在高速缓存中.

sentences.en: In your Web browser's cache are the most recent Web files that you have downloaded.
sentences.cn: 网页浏览器的高速缓存区里有你最近下载的网页文件。

sentences.en: Intelligent Disk Cache system which protects your hard disk from high - speed download.
sentences.cn: 智能磁盘高速缓存系统,保护您的硬盘从超高速下载.

sentences.en: It also acceptable to cache versioned data since each version is immutable.
sentences.cn: 既然每个版本的数据是不可变的,那么混存版本化数据也是可以接受的.

sentences.en: Method Two : Repair Local Area Connection, to clear the DNS cache purposes.
sentences.cn: 方法 二: 修复本地连接, 达到清除DNS缓存的目的.

sentences.en: Police discovered a cache of weapons in the room.
sentences.cn: 警方在房间里发现了一批隐藏的武器.

sentences.en: Setup found a compressed volume or a disk - cache utility on your computer.
sentences.cn: 安装程序在计算机上发现压缩卷或磁盘缓存实用程序.

sentences.en: The data needed is found in the cache.
sentences.cn: 在高速缓冲存储器中找到所需数据.

sentences.en: The database state cache was already initialized in the extended stored procedure.
sentences.cn: 扩展存储过程中的数据库状态高速缓存已初始化.

sentences.en: The DNS cache can significantly improve DNS query performance throughout your organization.
sentences.cn: DNS缓存可显著地增强遍及您的组织机构的DNS查询性能.

sentences.en: The external cache ( or B - Cache ) mixes the two together.
sentences.cn: 而外部高速缓存 ( B - Cache ) 将两者混合.

sentences.en: The maximum size of the client cache, in bytes.
sentences.cn: 客户端的缓存最大数, 单位是字节.

sentences.en: This store is known as the Address Resolution Protocol ( ARP ) cache.
sentences.cn: 这个存储器叫作地址分辨协议 ( arp ) 高速缓存.

words.tran_cn: [计]电脑高速缓冲存储器；贮存物；隐藏处

phrases.tran_cn: 高速缓冲存储器；快取记忆体

trans.tran_cn: 藏物处，隐藏处，藏匿的珍宝，<电脑>快速缓冲贮存区
trans.tran_en: a number of things that have been hidden, especially weapons, or the place where they have been hidden
to hide something in a secret place, especially weapons
